column1: '''Rowan''' was the oldest child of [[Holman the greenhanded]].
Rowan married [[Hob Gammidge]], a roper from [[Tighfield]]. They had one son, [[Hobson]], who became a roper like his father.<ref>{{App

column2: Rowan]]'' is a type of tree, the European mountain ash. The name is of Scandinavian origin akin to [[Norse]] ''rau√∞'' "red" (because of its red berries).<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
